list_translation_mean.translate_mean: cái ống dây ở cần câu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in folklore) an ugly creature depicted as either a giant or a dwarf.
a person who makes a deliberately offensive or provocative online post.
a line or bait used in trolling for fish.
make a deliberately offensive or provocative online post with the aim of upsetting someone or eliciting an angry response from them.
carefully and systematically search an area for something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a group of companies trolling for partnership opportunities
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một nhóm các công ty trolling cho các cơ hội hợp tác

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: sing (something) in a happy and carefree way.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Troll the Yuletide Carol cổ đại
